name: learning-<%= whatLearningLink %>
description: <%= description %> (This file was first created using the Yeoman generator generator-hchiam-learning: https://www.npmjs.com/package/generator-hchiam-learning)

scripts.start: rm -rf dist || true; npm run build:css; parcel src/index.html --out-dir dist --cache-dir .cache --open; # react-scripts start;
scripts.build: rm -rf dist || true; npm run build:css; parcel build src/index.html --out-dir dist --cache-dir .cache --no-source-maps; # react-scripts build;
scripts.build:css:
printf '
Please wait a few seconds for postcss to optimize your CSS.
'; postcss ./src/style.css -o ./src/style-postcss.css
scripts.test: npm run start & (if (cypress run); then echo 'Now running Jest tests:' && jest --passWithNoTests && npm run reminder:stop; else npm run reminder:stop && exit 1; fi;); # CI=true react-scripts test;
scripts.reminder:stop: echo; echo 'Reminder: \033[1;34mControl+C\033[0m and \033[1;34mnpm run stop\033[0m to stop the "start" script.'; echo;
scripts.lighthouse:
printf '
Please wait 10 seconds for the browser to open automatically and test the production version built to dist.

'; npx serve dist & (sleep 10; lighthouse http://localhost:5000; open *.report.html; killall node;)
scripts.zip: zip -r ${PWD##*/}.zip * .eslintignore .eslintrc.js .gitignore .travis.yml -x "node_modules/*"; echo; echo "created ${PWD##*/}.zip inside this folder"; echo;

author: <%= author %>

hooks.pre-commit: npm run reminder; if (npm run fix && npm test); then npm run reminder; else (npm run reminder && exit 1); fi;
